Name: Void -Dementia-
About the game: The secret of the void area I don't know why she's here or what she did here You must find the piece of memory and find out what this place is and what she is. Every action in the game is a way for her to bring her memories back. When she fights enemies and defeats bosses, she can bring back memories of the past. Swap weapon action A weapon master who can freely use three types of weapons: katana, dual blade, and greatsword. She is the best swordsman who can freely switch weapons against her enemies at any time. If you can find her lost memories, you will be able to use even powerful skills. Immortal fate The Void Realm rejects her and threatens her. But she is immortal. The five bosses, beyond human power, prevent her from leaving the void realm. She must overcome it and move on. 1.0 official launch Our game is complete. Story mode 5 special boss battles 50 skills 19 Masteries 48 challenges online ranking Res tower mode action roguelike game 100th floor stage ready 27 exclusive skills 27 evolution skills
